Our Mission To appraise and evaluate

Our mission is to bring you an efficient and objective expertise in order to make your life easier at the time of a removal or a legacy from a close relative.

Our role is to assist you and as well as possible prepare - for best possible secure valorization - the real estate and the whole of the objects contained in this one. We evaluate the best price for your goods according to the values given by professionals.

We thus protect you from pitfalls, bad advice and possible wrongdoing.

We appraise the property and contents. We sort, value, organise and coordinate the total contents of a property.

From the specialized sales-room to emptying the house, we ensure the entirety of the preparation.

If you need more info about our services
